  index: "stackoverflow",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    query_string: {
      query: "tags:kibana",
    },
  },
  runtime_mappings: {
    "tags.hash": {
      type: "long",
      script: "emit(doc['tags'].hashCode())",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    my_unbiased_sample: {
      diversified_sampler: {
        shard_size: 200,
        max_docs_per_value: 3,
        field: "tags.hash",
      },
      aggs: {
        keywords: {
          significant_terms: {
            field: "tags",
            exclude: ["kibana"],
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
